name: TargetTap
description:
TargetTap is back! Replay the original iPhone game from 2008!

Test your reflexes with this exciting new game made exclusively for the iPhone, iPod Touch and iPad. Hit the red targets quickly to pop them and build up massive combos, but watch out for other colored targets which will make you lose a life! Also don't miss any red ones because you will also lose a life!

Look out for the one-up cloud to score an extra life!

How long can you survive!

"It's addictive, uncomplicated, addictive, and sleek. Did I mention it's addictive?" - whatsoniphone.com
